channel.title: GenAI Applications on Fernando's Hub
channel.description: Recent content in GenAI Applications on Fernando's Hub

item.title: Hands-On: Crafting Your Personal GenAI Roadmap
item.description: Collaborate with GenAI to build a tailored roadmap for continuing your journey. Reflect on tools, techniques, and goals to ensure ongoing success.

item.title: The GenAI Edge: Key Takeaways and Next Steps
item.description: Reflect on the tools, techniques, and insights from The GenAI Edge series. Learn how to integrate Generative AI into your journey moving forward with clarity and confidence.

item.title: Hands-On: Crafting a Business Pitch and MVP with GenAI
item.description: Use GenAI to combine a strong business pitch with a lean MVP strategy. This step-by-step guide will take you from concept to validation with clarity and confidence.

item.title: From Idea to Reality: Starting Your Business Journey with GenAI
item.description: Learn how to turn your business idea into a reality with GenAI as your Thinking Buddy. Validate, stress-test, and refine your plans step by step.

item.title: Hands-On: Strategic Evaluation of Job Offers with GenAI
item.description: Discover how to apply GenAI and Chain of Thought Prompting to make smarter, more informed career decisions.

item.title: Strategic Planning with GenAI: Expanding Your Personal Horizons
item.description: Explore how GenAI can expand your personal strategic thinking, challenge assumptions, and inspire innovative solutions for achieving your goals.

item.title: Hands-On: Applying Lean Methodology to Your Business with GenAI
item.description: Discover how to apply Lean Methodology to a business using GenAI to iterate quickly, validate assumptions, and improve efficiency.
